index.js:
function convertToRoman(num) {
  const decimal = [ 1000, 900, 500, 400, 100, 90, 50, 40, 10, 9, 5, 4, 1 ]
  const roman = [ 'M', 'CM', 'D', 'CD', 'C', 'XC', 'L', 'XL', 'X', 'IX', 'V', 'IV', 'I' ]

  let romanized = ''

  for (let i in decimal) {
    while (decimal[i] <= num) {
      romanized += roman[i]
      num -= decimal[i]
    }
  }

 return romanized
}

convertToRoman(36)
